title: Ryder Cup 2025: USA 13-15 Europe as visitors earn dramatic win after weathering storm in epic singles finale – live
summary: Scott Murray provides live updates on the 11 singles matches, as the US team aims for a comeback. Follow for real-time hole-by-hole coverage. Stay tuned for the latest developments in the competition.

title: Australia news live: Labor’s first deficit not as bad as feared; ‘exhausted’ sailors rescued after two days adrift
summary: Please provide the news article or details you'd like summarized, and I'll be happy to help!

title: Lowry sinks putt that retains Ryder Cup for Europe as they hold off US comeback
summary: Shane Lowry secured a crucial birdie, bringing Europe to 14 points in a tense competition. Despite a strong comeback from the USA, they ultimately fell short. Europe clinched victory with a final score of 15-13 at Bethpage Black.

title: Optus suffers fresh triple-zero outage in NSW as police check welfare of callers
summary: A telecommunications provider has reported that nine triple-zero emergency calls failed during an outage in the Dapto region. The company has issued an apology to affected customers. The incident raises concerns about emergency service accessibility during disruptions.

title: Anemone review – Daniel Day-Lewis returns for a bleak and painfully serious misfire
summary: At the New York film festival, an actor makes a comeback from retirement alongside his son, who directs a thoughtful yet slow-paced film focused on the experiences of war-torn men. The film explores heavy themes and highlights the emotional toll of conflict. Audience reactions to the film's weighty subject matter remain mixed.
